title: The best travel gadgets of 2023: Expert travel tech

title: Sonos Era smart speakers now available to buy: Here's what's new

title: Italy just banned ChatGPT. Could the US be next?
description: This decision was made following a data breach in March which exposed ChatGPT users' conversations and and other sensitive information.

title: Glitch in system upgrade identified as cause of delays at Singapore immigration
description: Technical glitch during a scheduled upgrade affected all automated immigration clearance systems and led to rare delays at Singapore's Changi Airport, which recently was again named the world's best airport.

title: ChatGPT's intelligence is zero, but it's a revolution in usefulness, says AI expert

title: How to set up your own NAS for more reliable data backups
description: For World Backup Day, we'll walk you through the steps to set up your own file sharing backup system.

title: Job scams powered by ChatGPT could try to rob you. How to protect yourself
description: As layoffs have caused people to look for jobs, scammers are using AI chatbots to create fake listings to steal money and data. Don't miss these safety tips.
